Sales epigrammatum being the choicest disticks of Martials fourteen books of epigrams, and of all the chief Latin poets that have writ in these two last centuries : together with Cato's Morality / made English by James Wright. Catonis disticha. English & Latin. Wright, James, 1643-1713. Martial. Epigrammata. English & Latin. Selections.
[8], 179 p.
Printed by T.R. for Christopher Eccleston ..., London : 1663.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Latin with English translation on facing pages. Errata on front flyleaf.
